name: Un Pas Fragile (itch)
description:
Un Pas Fragile wants you to follow the path of a little frog who wanted to learn ballet. To the day she enter the academy until her debut on stage, through the suffering and sacrifices.

The player, both spectator and mentor, follows several short life sequences of this frog chaining in an unexpected way.

IGF Student winner 2017

Made in less than 3 month at ENJMIN (French school), in 2015 :

  • Géraud de Courrèges: Game design and programming
  • Alisée Preud'homme: Art and animation
  • Grégory Parisi: Art and backgrounds
  • Gaspard Morel: Sounds
